bismillah: In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
message: This app is dedicated to their beautiful souls. Though they have returned to Allah, their love for knowledge and the Quran lives on through these stories, as a gift to all who seek guidance and wisdom.

dua.translation: O Allah, forgive them and have mercy upon them

verse.translation: Indeed, to Allah we belong and to Him we shall return

appName: Alaya & Soad's Gift: Stories from Jannah
